name: VS BitBucket
description: This theme is inspired by the default VSCode theme. Ideal for those who want to highlight their code in the code review or Pull Request diffs. Minimal changes for now, Full dark theme coming soon If you wish to contribute: https://gitlab.com/jonathanhacklife/vs-bitbucket/
additional_info:

-Correction of the color difference display to darker tones
